CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje
Electronic System for Public Procurement (ESJN: https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/)

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Medical, Laboratory Equipment and Monitoring Devices

LOCATION.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje 50 Divizija, No. 6

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Medical, laboratory equipment and monitoring devices

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Mortuary trolley for transporting corpses, stainless steel with 4 wheels, of which at least two are locked; with raised edges and a drain with stainless steel small pool for collecting the liquid; height of the cart (together with the wheels) minimum 80 cm to a maximum of 88 cm; length of the upper part of a minimum of 200cm; width of the upper part of a minimum of 80cm

Portable magnifying glass with magnification of min. 2 LED lights, minimum diameter of 110mm, Minimum increase of: 2 times; with a possibility of placing on a table, with a guarantee period of at least one year

Gaiger-Muller counter for monitoring alpha, beta, gamma and X-ray radiation; with a detector based on a halogen-treated uncompensated Gaiger-Muller tube with a slim window with interval thickness 1.5-2 0 mg / ^2; with energy sensitivity to detect: alpha radiation at 3.6 MeV with minimum efficiency of 80 %, beta radiation at 50 keV with a minimum efficiency of 35 %, beta radiation at 150 keV with a minimum efficiency of 75 %, a gamma and a radiant radiation of at least 40 keV; with a precision of maximum deviations + -15 % of the full scale (reference to Cs-137); with a visual analog scale with a double indicator in CPM and mR / hr, with an operative interval of 0-50 mR / hr and 0-50000 cpm; with LED as indicator for counting; with an acoustic signal as an indicator of increased radiation level; with working DC voltage of battery in the interval 7-11V; in a package that is mobile for manual use and monitoring

Device for assisted evaporation and concentration with the following technical characteristics: Laboratory evaporator-concentrator with terminal compressor pump; Have a minimum of 6, and a maximum of 8 vials for evaporation and concentration with air; All vials serve to evaporate fluid volumes from a minimum of 1ml to a maximum of 250ml; Compatible compressor connection pump with a pressure range from 1 to a maximum of 2.5 bar. The compressor pump to have a valve with a manometer for regulating air or nitrogen flow; The compressor pump to have an intake hose with a minimum length of 90 cm, maximum 120 cm

Light microscope for histological analysis (for work in a light field) with metal body and fixed diffuser, built-in camera for direct photo; an eco-illuminating source of light-emitting halogen-based illumination of at least 30 watts and a light HBO source for fluorescence or an ice source of fluorescence with a maximum wavelength of at least 340nm and a minimum at an upper limit of 440 nm; ergonomic trinocular with vertical and horizontal eyepieces and an option for binocular updating; Adapter for camera with adjustable optical lens; binoculars with adaptive diopter and increase at least 10 times; ceramic coated carrier of the preparation; an achromatic condenser that should be suitable for fluorescence, device diaphragm for light; revolver with a minimum of 5 places for objectives: Minimum x4 / 0,1mm and a working distance of minimum 10 mm; x10 / 0,25 mm and a working distance of minimum 10,5 mm; x20 / 0.40 mm and a working distance of minimum 1mm; x40 / 0.65mm and a working distance of minimum 0.57mm; x100 / 1.25mm and a working distance of minimum 0.18mm; embedded digital camera (minimum 10 megapixels) for morphometry with software capable of measuring the length and surface of the objects to be seen, the possibility of staining and adjusting the gamut, contrast and exposure of light; with an appropriate personal computer, a test calibrator for morphometry with a micrometer scale; microscope cleaning kit, protective cloak

Microscope for practical instruction, with built-in commands for chair movements, adjustable movement resistance with a minimum setting of 2.5 micrometers, 4-lens mounting lens, 30-degree binocular eyepiece tube, adjustable interpupillary distance from 48-75mm., adjustable dioptry on one sleeve, wide angle eyepieces (2 pcs.) 10x / FN 20, mechanical chair for right-hand preparations for motion of the chair and adjustment of motion resistance, Abbe condenser with NA 1,25 or equivalent, built-in LED transmission lighting, lenses: Plan Akhromatic 4x, NA 0.10, working distance 27mm; Plan Akhromatic 10x, NA 0,25, working distance 8mm; Plan Akhromatic 40x, NA 0.65 working distance 0,6mm, correction for cover glass 0,17, protection for protection of the product from breaking. All lenses and eyepieces to have protection against mold

Immune analyzer for enzyme amplified chemiluminescence with at least 200 immunological analyzes per hour for more than 20 different parameters (H.pylory (igG), CMV IgG, CMV IgM, Rubella IgG, Rubella IgM, Toxoplasma IgG, Toxoplasma IgM, Anti HbS, HbS Ag, Anti HBc Total, Anti HBc IgM, HBs Ag confirmatory, Calcitonin, EBV-EBNA IgG, Herpes I and II IgG, Syphilis, IL-6, IL-2R), a capacity of at least 90 copies at once, with automatic dilution without manual pipetting and retesting; with automatic detection of coagulum, reagent cooling, waste disposal, real time monitoring; to have a suitable computer, printer and uninterruptible power supply included Power supply 220-240V / 50Hz; in the range of analyzes, contain markers for said infectious diseases (H.pylory igG, EBV-EBNA IgG, EBV-VCA IgG, EBV-VCAIgM, Syphilis, Hbs Ab, Hbs Ab quantitative, CMV IgG, CMV IgM, Rubella Ig, Rubella IgM, -Toxoplasma IgG, Toxoplasma IgM, Hbc Total, HBc IgM, Hbs confirmatory) and to have a minimum period of three years

Equipment for optical experiments in physics with a minimum 3-line red laser beam generator, minimum 1 bi-concave glass prism, minimum 1 curved glass prism (1 side of concave and 1 convex side), minimum 1 oval bi-convex glass prism, minimum 1 triangular glass prism, minimum 1 glass rectangle, minimum 1 semicircular glass prism, minimum 1 translucent water tank, with a minimum period of one year warranty

Measuring equipment for electrical phenomena, with laboratory power supply with output DC voltage from 0V to 18V, output DC current from 0A to 3A, accuracy of LCD display maximum +/- 1 % for voltage and maximum +/- 2 % for electricity, variable resistor for laboratory experiments with resistance in the range from 0 ohms to 9999 ohms in a box with rotating buttons, digital multimeter for measuring voltage, direct current, resistance and temperature with a display of minimum 2000 digits display, with a minimum of one year warranty with power supply from 210V to 240V and frequency from 50Hz to 60Hz

Equipment for measuring electrophysiological signals with data acquisition system with minimum 4 analog channels, A / D sampling resolution with minimum 24-bit, input voltage in the range of ± 200μV to ± 2V, signal-to-noise ratio minimum 89 dB, minimum compatible with a USB 2.0 port, a minimum of two lead sets for electrodes for measuring minimum ECG, EEG and EMG compatible with a minimum 9 pin connector according to DIN standard or equivalent and cable length of at least 2 meters, respiratory convertor into an electrical signal for measuring respiration through change on the volume of the breast or abdomen wrapped in a range of 9 cm to 130 cm, compatible with a 9 pin DIN connector with a cable length of at least 2 meters, physiological disposable electrodes with button for connection with other electrodes minimum 200 pieces and a minimum dimension of 35mm with minimum warranty period one year, with a power of 210V to 240V and a frequency of 50Hz to 60Hz

Equipment for ultrasonic wave experiments with minimum 2 ultrasonic transmitters with a minimum frequency of 40 kHz, minimum 1 ultrasonic pen, minimum 1 ultrasonic absorber, minimum 1 ultrasonic control, minimum 1 microphone probe, minimum 2 BNC cables with a minimum length of 1 meter, minimum 1 concave mirror, minimum 2 beam splitters, with a warranty period of at least one year, with a power of 210V to 240V and a frequency of 50Hz to 60Hz

Equipment for analogue measurement for analogue electrical quantities called an analogue multimeter with a voltage range of minimum 1000V AC / DC, a basic accuracy of maximum ± 3 % for DC or a maximum of ± 4 % for AC, a measurement of dB from 10 dB to ± 50dB, measurment of small currents DC minimum 50uA, measurement of resistance to a minimum of 20 Megagons, sensitivity minimum 20 Kiomos / V for DC, ie minimum 8 Kiomos / V for AC, with a minimum one year warranty

Observation device, a breast examination model, with an opportunity for inspection and palpation of multiple pathological conditions, positioned in a lying position, but with the opportunity to be used and standing (upright); to provide access to the two axillas, to possess palpable ribs, sternum and clavicles, enlarged lymph nodes in axillary and subclavianular areas, orange bark with inflammation, inverted nipple; to include a stiff foot, right and left insertion of the chest, skin cover; to include a different size of tumors with a diameter of 1 to 4 cm and shape (round, ovate, irregular), 3 tumor sets (27 tissues), 9 soft tissues of the breast, 1 hard lump to present infiltration of the chest; to own a packing box and baby powder; dimensions: maximum 35x28x15 cm; weight: not more than 8 kg

Observation device for prostate and rectum examination should have 4 separate prostatitis glands: 1 benign gland and 3 stages of prostate cancer at varying degrees of development; each gland can be inserted into the phantom to allow practice in diagnosis with rectal palpation; to own a packing box, a lubricant; dimension, maximum 56x38x30 cm; weight: not more than 9 kg

Observation device-Model of a sagittal head and neck of human in natural size, the mandible branch should be cut to show the deepest parts of the infratemporal pit, the pterygoid muscles should be removed to show the outer pterygoid lamina and the back from the maxilla

Vertical sterilization machine (autoclave) with included stainless chamber and built-in heaters (min.9 kw made of inox) special steam generator made of inox with (automatic addition of ionized water), to have a system for connecting with existing existing device for the de-ionization of water, with capacity of 125-150 liters, quick cooling of water up to 80 C, continuous monitoring of all parameters, continuous archiving of data from cycles, self-exclusion in defects, protection against unwanted opening in low temperature cycles, automatic air exhaust system at certain intervals, mechanical pressure indicator, safety valve (built-in safety test and correct operation of valves), time of first cycle for max 20 min. The device to contain a stop signal or a cycle error, low water level or an open door. The autoclave to be calibrated at 121 C. With a 24 month warranty and installation included.

Counter gamma radiation for use in a nuclear medicine laboratory; with a NaI (Tl) (sodium iodide-thallium) detector based on a minimum 32x32mm surface area for single-photon counting; with a reading efficiency of at least 75 % relative to I-125 (iodine-125);supposedly to work with the following cores:I-125 (iodine-125), I-129 (iodine-129), Co-57 (cobalt-57), Co-58 (cobalt-58), Cr-51 (chromium-51), Cs-137 (cesium-137); which works with radiation with energetic values ​​in the interval from 15 keV to 1000 keV; with counting time in the interval from 0.1 seconds to 5999940 seconds; which works with tubes and vials with a maximum diameter of 13 mm; with protection from a lead coating with a minimum thickness of 8 mm; with digital LCD screen; portable with a maximum weight of 9 kg; by supplying an AC voltage of 100 to 240 V at a frequency of 50 / 60Hz

Real-time polymeric chain reaction device, including a computer, monitor and printer. Have at least 5 emission and 5 excitation filters and be calibrated to work with multiple fluorophores. The cooling and heating system is based on Peltier technology. To have accuracy at temperature: +/- 0.25ºC and temperature uniformity: +/- 0.5ºC. The speed of raising and lowering the temperature should be at least: +/- 1,1ºC / sec, maximum 2,5ºC / sec. To have ability to perform PCR reactions in less than 2 hours. The device should be an open system (use consumables from multiple manufacturers) and include appropriate software for designing samples and primers as well as for controlling the instrument and collecting data for analysis. A minimum of 12 months warranty, with customer service and training.

Device for flow cytometer capable of measuring at least 16 parameters per sample: minimum 14 fluorescent color data, front and side scattering with a computer turned on and a minimum of 23 inches screen. To process samples at a flow rate of at least 12.5 to 1000 μL per minute and able to analyze particles in the size of 0.5 μm to 50 μM. To include the matrix for signal compensation and the adjustment of the optical configuration independently by the user. Use upper flat lasers and an optical path with a CV stability <3 %. It can store up to 35,000 events / second, and the total fluid consumption is less than 1 L per day. The minimum volume should be 20 μl. To have the ability to analyze rare cells and fluorescence sensitivity ≤ 80 MESF FITC; ≤ 30 MESF PE; ≤ 70 MESF APC. To have automated compensation that includes 14x14 matrix. A minimum of 12 months warranty, with customer service and training.

Fully automated biochemical analyzer, with a built-in or external computer with appropriate software, deionized water system (if the device uses reactive multi-use cells) with a capacity of at least 60 photometric analyzes per hour. The optical system uses LED as a light source or a halogen lamp capable of monochromatic and bi-chromatic measurement of at least 8 wavelengths with a minimum range of 340 to a maximum of 800 nm, to possess at least 8 sample positions with at least 27 reagent positions, continuous addition of samples and monitoring of samples at any time, possibility of working with STAT analysis, possibility for automatic detection at the level of liquid. Minimum measurement technology: Absorption photometry. Working with the following types of samples: Serum, Plasma, Urine. To have refrigerator for reagents and samples for constant temperature maintenance. Quantity of a sample of 1 to 50 μl, possibility for pre and post-dilution, with a built-in barcode reader for samples and reagents or an opportunity to work with an external barcode reader when reagents and samples are entered. To have an automatic dilution of the sample to a maximum of 1: 200. To protect against needle stroke during vertical movement. To have the possibility of birectional networking in a laboratory information system (LIS). The analyzer must operate on AC voltage at a maximum of 240 V. To produce quality control cards, or to have a built-in quality control program.

Automated electrolytic analyzer for determining a minimum of: Sodium (Na +), Potassium (K +), Calcium (Ca2 +), Chlorides (Cl-), Principle of operation: with ISE (ion selective electrode) potentiometry. Sample: serum / plasma / urine / full blood, sample quantity: min 50 μl, capacity of min 40 samples per hour, including own quality control software, Calibration: automatic or on request, with internal thermal printer included, secured service and training for users. Guarantee minimum 12 months

Acquisition computer for collecting, registering and storing data during the scan of patients under a gamma camera compatible with SIEMENS Signature E.CAM Single Camera Model No. 07823953 or equivalent

Automated system for recording and analyzing ECG and spirometry with digital interference filter, impedance input ≥ 5Mohms, frequency 0.05-150 Hz and resolution of 12 bits, automatic measurement, real-time flow-volume display and volume-time graphs, automated analysis, automatic interpretation with included software, portable computer and laser printer, automatic calibration or on request, service and training provided to users, guarantee for a minimum of 12 months.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Contract Performance Guarantee: Bank Guarantee of 10 %.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective court decision for participation in criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundering.
Certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority.
Certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent authority.
Certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public dues by the competent authority in the country where that economic operator is established.

Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — prohibition to participate in public competitions, public procurement contract award and public-private partnership contract award procedures.
Certificate from the Legal Entities Penal Registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity.

Certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing certain business activity.
Ability of the economic operator to perform business activity:

Certificate for wholesale of medical devices in accordance with the Law on medicine and medical devices except for items 8602 (Lot No. 8), 8604 (Lot No. 9), 8605 (Lot No. 10), 8606 (Lot No.11), 8607 (Lot No. 12).

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: To participate on electronic auction economic operators need to register on ESPP (Electronic System for Public Procurement) website: www.e-nabavki.gov.mk
Tender documentation, technical specification, forms and information for Open Procedure No 32/2017 are provided on the same website.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Electronically, ESJN (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/); Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State Appeals Commission for Public Procurement
